memorableMoments.message: My eyes got to see the most beautiful girl in the human kind for the very first time.
I Got to know her name from the front page of her notebook, Aasmi Surya.

The best day of my life. I unexpectdly propose Aasmi while walking outside "The Youth Library 2.0" and after having a lot of discussion she accepted my proposal and we were finally dating each other which was none less than a dream.
I decided to talk to Aasmi after 2 months and 20 days, because i finally realised what I did to her and how much she had to suffer because of me.

We went on our First "Official" Date, starting with having breakfast in Uncle Jack, then headed over to mittal mall to have some fun, like went into Pantaloons store and tried clothes with no intentions of buying them. Ended the date with having Waffles in Belgium Waffles and a small walk at Dadi Poti Park.

Start of the New Year together, although you slept off without even telling me but its alright as we met in the morning and went to Allen, wished everyone there including teachers, spent some time in Kung Fu Panda. And then had to drop you off to the bus stand just like a responsible husband, making you sit in the bus safely and bid you a bye for 2 days.

The day i confessed Aasmi that I like her, it was over text when she out of nowhere directly asked me weather i like her or not, i tried my best to not give an answer and even asked sameer about the situation but at the last ended up confessing my love for her to her only.

The day when Aasmi confessed her feelings for me, it was around late night we both were on calling and she was consoling me for something happened the previous day and suddenly i asks her weather she has feelings for me or not, she resisted for somewhile but ended up confessing it to me.

Today i was going to give Aasmi her birthday presents, A 'Dairy', ohh sorry Diary with a written note inside it and a parker pen, i was planning for this since the last week and was nervous to give it to her but finally in the evening while heading back, i gave her both the things in hurry and asked her to let me know about it on chat, which she by her own never did.

I confessed my feelings to Nayamat and Angel (Actually not me it was armaan who did it), They interogated me for so long and at last i had to bribe them with chocolates in order to help me and keep their mouth shushhh.

I and Aasmi shared lunch and earphones for the first time and i remember it was room no. 1, ground floor when i randomly came in the room and Aasmi asked me to sit with her and have lunch, while having it we decided to listen songs too. The first song i made her listen was "Kahani Suno 2.0", although she hated the song that time but after wards it was at top in her liked songs.

It was my and Aasmi's exam on the same day in same class, she was sitting in the front row and i was at the last ones, I barely focused on my exam as i was looking towards her for almost half of the time and plus it was advance pattern, but still i made it my best test till date and obviously the only reason was the girl sitting there <3.

It was Nayamat's Birthday, I was only 11th class person to be invited, because i was a part of their group so it wasn't a big deal for me. As soon as I reached there all of them started teasing Aasmi and seeing that i thought it made Aasmi uncomfortable so I decided to make some distance with her, which was the worst decision I ever took in my life, because taking this decision there were hell lot of consequences waiting for me ahead.

It was 5th day since I and Aasmi weren't on talking terms and I didn't realized how hurt she was because of actions until I saw her feelings so low and mood so upset that I decided to talk to her and sort things out with her. We both were in the room adjacent to the basement, where she was studying, I went there and took a chair next to her, In start she wasn't sharing what happened but at the end she finally pour her feelings out and I made her relaxed and appologized for my bad behaviour towards her.

We both went on a date and trust me it was the most amazing one, Firstly we went to a fair, there we got a ride in which Aasmi was so so scared, can't explain how much she was scared, then we went to Joggers Park, there we walked and even we had running challenge which was given by her because she belived that she can beat me in running, I didnt even ran properly I was just jogging and still i managed to reach earlier than her, and then after loosing she is putting it on her tight jeans. After that we went to have Jalebi and then a cafe to have coffee together.

It was Day 2 when I and Aasmi again started talking and we were gonna meet and talk for the first time face to face, she decided the place and it was The Youth Library 2.0, coincdently I, Dhruv and Ajay went there a few days ago and it was the same library where she used to study in free time. As I went there we greeted each other so formally and it was kind off a awkward meet, obviously we were facing each other after so long but still the bond we had never changed and I am so lucky about it.

We were on the terrace of the Library walking, chit chatting, talking about how time was when I wasn't there with her, how people near her treated her that time, how was the time with me all that. And suddenly I don't know from where but i got that urge to held her hands and I asked her for that, she firstly resisted but then we held hands and we walked there for atleast 30 mins. After that when we were going back, a guy came to us and asked that were we on the terrace walking, we said yes then he said that its a restricted area so we firstly panic but luckily no one saw us.

I can say this was the start of the worst face of my life, time without Aasmi was started. She suddenly cut off and stopped talking to me, although i knew the reason but still I wasn't ready to accept that and I thought that she will come back in 2 or 3 days like she did in past but it was my biggest fault to take her for granted which eventually resulted in this. I still regret that but it's alright now here I am trying my best to do whatever is in my hands to make her life the best she could ever ask for.

Today I said so much bad to her which obviously she never deserved but it was all did in anger and i know i did blunder that time, but still after all this she was there the next day in front of me scolding me for all my actions i did in the recent times that wasn't even related to her it was all my mess up things that she wanted me to realise and fix before the time is gone, I was hating her the last day but after that meet i was regreting every single word i said to her, because despite of fight she was their for me, hoping for my good and caring for me still like my best friend.
It was

quotes: “Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.” - Aristotle
“In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.” - Maya Angelou
“I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I’ve ever had.” - Nicholas Sparks
“You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.” - Dr. Seuss
“The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.” - Audrey Hepburn
“You are the source of my joy, the center of my world, and the whole of my heart.” - Unknown
“Love is not just looking at each other, it’s looking in the same direction.” - Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
“I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.” - Roy Croft
“The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you are loved for who you are, and nothing more.” - Angelita Lim
“To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.” - David Viscott
“Love is like the wind, you can’t see it but you can feel it.” - Nicholas Sparks
“You are the answer to every prayer I’ve offered.” - Nicholas Sparks
“I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.” - Leo Christopher
“Love is an endless mystery, for it has nothing else to explain it.” - Rabindranath Tagore
“My heart is, and always will be, yours.” - Jane Austen
